Kim Jong Il Praised by Gambian President 
   Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- Only leader Kim Jong Il is a great man whom I, as a head of state, respect and trust from the bottom of my heart.
 Yaya A.J.J. Jammeh, president of Gambia, said this when receiving credentials from Kim Pong Hui, DPRK ambassador e.p. to his country on June 13.    
 The president said the Gambian government believes that Korea will be reunified in the near future and he will make all possible efforts to this end.
